name: Dexus Alpha
description:
Dexus is an steam assisted 3D platformer where controls are simple and puzzles are plenty. I have taken inperation from one of my favorite games C.U.B.E but I choose the simple mechanics for a very good reason.

This is only my second ever game and my first was a prototype of these mechanics for a game jam I joined two days before its closure.

I hope you enjoy my game for what it is and tell me what you do and don't like about its mechanics! Thank you so much ~ Joel

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

Ctrl = Crouch

Left Mouse = Retract

Right Mouse = Extract

Escape = Pause Menu
